\ Add or Update an Address To ADD an address, log in to your MyPack Portal:
Select your Student Homepage Select the ‘Personal Information’ tile From the left-hand navigation menu, select ‘Addresses’ Under the appropriate header, e.g. ‘Diploma Address,’ if no address is defined, select the ‘Add Diploma Address’ button You can either select the ‘Copy From’ button to copy the address from address that is already on record, or manually enter an address in the given fields Select the green ‘Save’ button
To UPDATE an address that you have already provided, log into your MyPack Portal:
Select your Student Homepage Select the ‘Personal Information’ tile From the left-hand navigation menu, select ‘Addresses’ Under the appropriate header, e.g. ‘Home Address,’ click on the address box under the appropriate header Update the address fields as necessary Select the green ‘Save’ button
